column3: 中文描述

column3: 产品尺寸
column5: The physical dimensions of the product

column3: 产品重量
column5: How heavy or light the product feels

column3: 风扇在不同档位下的出风量和风速感受
column5: Fan airflow and wind speed performance at different settings
column6: “Pushes a lot of air; creates quite a breeze for its small size.”

column3: 风扇运转时的稳定性及是否出现摆动或震动
column5: Fan stability and wobble during operation

column3: 遥控器及其他控制方式的功能性和易用性
column5: Features related to remote access or control
column6: “Very little information regarding certain buttons; remote controls fan and light, but I'm concerned about losing it.”

column3: 风扇运行时的声音大小及其舒适度
column5: How loud or quiet the product operates
column6: “Units are extremely quiet; can barely hear the motor even at high speed.”

column3: 风扇可以反向旋转
column5: The ability to reverse airflow direction

column3: 风扇的能源效率和电力消耗情况
column5: how cost-effective and eco-friendly the product is
column6: “Able to set air conditioner higher due to fan breeze; not sure if it is energy efficient.”

column3: 产品的计时功能
column5: The ability to set a countdown or scheduled on/off time

column3: 风扇灯光的亮度以及可调节性
column5: The intensity of the light output
column6: “Light does not dim; lacks a dimmer; light is not dimmable.”

column3: 灯光颜色的舒适度，可调节性
column5: The hue or temperature of the emitted light

column3: 可以调节成任意颜色
column5: fully adjustable RGB lighting with support for any color customization.

column3: 和智能家居系统的集成
column5: Compatibility with smart home systems like Alexa etc.

column3: 风力是否达到能在户外或者大空间使用
column5: Whether the product is appropriate for use in big rooms or outside environments.

column3: 风扇安装过程中需要的专业技术和工具要求产生的难度以及花费的时长
column5: Including Installation difficulty, technical requirements, and time consumption
column6: “Blades were tricky to install; challenging to install on a 20 ft ceiling without a proper electrical box.”

column3: 说明书质量，包括清晰度
column5: Refers to the clarity, accuracy, and helpfulness of the instruction manual

column3: 风扇及灯具的外观风格和视觉美观程度
column5: visual characteristics and aesthetic presentation
column6: “Fan looks great in the master bedroom; nice modern look.”

column3: 产品的颜色搭配
column5: Refers to the overall color combination and design of the product's exterior.

column3: 包括产品整体的质量，耐用度等
column5: Refers to the long-term sturdiness and resistance of the desk to wear, damage, or malfunction over time

column3: 包括扇叶的质量，稳定性，耐用度
column5: Fan blade quality, stability, and durability

column3: 产品的吊杆长度以及调节性，质量等等
column5: Downrod length, adjustability, and quality

column3: 防水性，包括是否容易生锈
column5: Water resistance, including rust prevention

column3: 风扇日常清洁和维护的难易程度
column5: Ease of daily cleaning and maintenance
column6: “Long, hard plastic blades that are easy to clean; blades are made of molded plastic.”

column3: 零件如螺丝，小金属件的质量
column5: Quality of hardware parts such as screws and small metal components

column3: 风扇价格与性能或功能之间的价值比较
column5: Refers to the overall satisfaction with the product relative to its price
column6: “Product quality not matching price paid; great light for the price range.”

column3: 运送速度
column5: Refers to the time taken from order placement to delivery

column3: 包裹质量
column5: The package was intact upon arrival. Damage to internal parts does not imply poor packaging.

column3: 到达时产品完整度，包括 Parts， Accessories 是否完整无缺失
column5: Upon arrival, the completeness of product, including parts and accessories, and any damage or dedects.

column3: 客服质量，包括回复速度，回复质量等
column5: Customer service quality, including response speed and response quality

column3: 售后服务，包括缺件补件等
column5: Missing Part Replacement, etc.

column3: 退货体验
column5: Refers to the ease and efficiency of the product return process

column3: 是否愿意分享给它人
column5: Willingness to Recommend to Others
